translations: n.（异父或异母生的）继姐，继妹

phrs.translation: 继姐妹, 异父之姐妹, 异父姊妹, 继姐
继姐妹, 继姐, 异父姊妹

sentences.sentence: Why they call you an ugly stepsister, I'll never know.
sentences.translation: 为什么他们要叫你“丑陋的继姐”，我一直都弄不明白。

sentences.sentence: If you want I'll invite my stepsister and her to have dinner with us.
sentences.translation: 如果你愿意的话，我会请我那个姐姐，还有她和我们一起吃晚饭。

sentences.sentence: Sure. If you want I'll invite my stepsister and her to have dinner with us.
sentences.translation: 当然会。如果你愿意的话，我会请我那个姐姐，还有她和我们一起吃晚饭。
